content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":193192,"originalJapaneseLine":"一緒に遊ぶよりも、遊んでる子達を眺めている方が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather than playing together, watching the kids playing"},{"lineNumber":193193,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の私には性に合っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"suits me better right now."},{"lineNumber":193194,"originalJapaneseLine":"元気一杯にはしゃぎ、平和を謳歌する、","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing the younger children full of energy and enjoying peace,"},{"lineNumber":193195,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分より年下の子達を見ていると、","translatedEnglishLine":"when I look at kids younger than me,"},{"lineNumber":193196,"originalJapaneseLine":"思わずほのぼのとした気持ちに包まれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"I couldn't help but feel a warm and peaceful feeling."},{"lineNumber":193197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「姫様、お耳に入れられましたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Princess, have you heard?\""},{"lineNumber":193198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでも、第17次魔王討伐隊が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently, the 17th Demon Lord Subjugation Force"},{"lineNumber":193199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王城に向かったとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"headed towards the Demon Lord's castle...\""},{"lineNumber":193200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、それ私も聞きました！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I heard that too!"},{"lineNumber":193201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでも全滅しちゃったとか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, they were all wiped out!\""},{"lineNumber":193202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「可哀想に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How pitiful..."},{"lineNumber":193203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メンバーの中にいた、","translatedEnglishLine":"One of the members,"},{"lineNumber":193204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　18歳の子が散々犯されたとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"an 18-year-old girl, was ruthlessly violated...\""},{"lineNumber":193205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、魔王討伐隊に若い娘は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why they say young girls shouldn't be included"},{"lineNumber":193206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　入れちゃいけないって言われてるのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"in the Demon Lord Subjugation Force...\""},{"lineNumber":193207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...\""},{"lineNumber":193208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":193209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！　す、すみません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! I-I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":193210,"originalJapaneseLine":"娘の前で父親の悪行を語ることの","translatedEnglishLine":"Realizing the meaning of speaking about one's father's misdeeds in front of his daughter,"},{"lineNumber":193211,"originalJapaneseLine":"意味に気づいたようで、","translatedEnglishLine":"she seemed to realize it,"},{"lineNumber":193212,"originalJapaneseLine":"女の子は慌ててぺこぺこと頭を下げてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the girl hurriedly bowed repeatedly in apology."},{"lineNumber":193213,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は苦笑を浮かべて、","translatedEnglishLine":"I gave a wry smile,"},{"lineNumber":193214,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいよいいよと手を振って答える。","translatedEnglishLine":"waving my hand and saying it was fine."},{"lineNumber":193215,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰が悪いかと言われれば……","translatedEnglishLine":"If asked who was at fault..."},{"lineNumber":193216,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは、やはり――父だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"it is, of course — father."},{"lineNumber":193217,"originalJapaneseLine":"思わず溜め息が漏れ出て、","translatedEnglishLine":"A sigh slipped out involuntarily,"},{"lineNumber":193218,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は遠い空を見上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and I looked up at the distant sky."},{"lineNumber":193219,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then,"},{"lineNumber":193220,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界は変わってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the world has changed."},{"lineNumber":193221,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王となった父は、魔物達に対して、","translatedEnglishLine":"My father, who became the Demon Lord, toward the demons,"},{"lineNumber":193222,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類圏の戦争行為を禁じ……","translatedEnglishLine":"forbade acts of war in the human realm..."},{"lineNumber":193223,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、姿を消した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and then disappeared."},{"lineNumber":193224,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の各国、そして魔軍も","translatedEnglishLine":"All the countries of the world, and even the demon armies,"},{"lineNumber":193225,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王である父ランスを探したが見つけられず、","translatedEnglishLine":"searched for my father Rance, the Demon Lord, but could not find him,"},{"lineNumber":193226,"originalJapaneseLine":"一年後にまた現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and he reappeared a year later."},{"lineNumber":193227,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界に新魔王軍を宣言し、","translatedEnglishLine":"He declared a new Demon Lord army to the world,"},{"lineNumber":193228,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山に本拠地を作った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and made his base on Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":193229,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時の私の周囲の人達の混乱っぷりを想像すると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Imagining how confused the people around me were back then,"},{"lineNumber":193230,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し、頭痛がする。大変だったろうなぁ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I get a slight headache. It must have been tough."},{"lineNumber":193231,"originalJapaneseLine":"父は魔王になっても概ね変わらなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"My father didn't really change much even after becoming the Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":193232,"originalJapaneseLine":"好き勝手、自分本位、やりたい放題。","translatedEnglishLine":"Selfish, self-centered, doing whatever he pleased."},{"lineNumber":193233,"originalJapaneseLine":"普通の魔王と違うらしいのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"What seems different from an ordinary Demon Lord is that,"},{"lineNumber":193234,"originalJapaneseLine":"父は支配という考えに興味がなかったという点。","translatedEnglishLine":"my father had no interest in the idea of domination."},{"lineNumber":193235,"originalJapaneseLine":"新魔王軍もせいぜい総数数千に過ぎない、","translatedEnglishLine":"The new Demon Lord army numbers only a few thousand at best,"},{"lineNumber":193236,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっとした勢力らしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"a rather small force."},{"lineNumber":193237,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、やることは恐ろしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"But what they do is terrifying."},{"lineNumber":193238,"originalJapaneseLine":"定期的に翔竜山より下りて来ては、","translatedEnglishLine":"They regularly come down from Mount Shoryu,"},{"lineNumber":193239,"originalJapaneseLine":"国に攻め込んで可愛い女の子をさらって、","translatedEnglishLine":"invade countries, kidnap cute girls,"},{"lineNumber":193240,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイプするだけして、逃がす。","translatedEnglishLine":"rape them, then let them go."},{"lineNumber":193241,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻めて来られた国は当然、","translatedEnglishLine":"The countries attacked naturally"},{"lineNumber":193242,"originalJapaneseLine":"軍で防備を固めるがほとんど意味をなさない。","translatedEnglishLine":"fortify defenses with their armies, but it hardly makes a difference."},{"lineNumber":193243,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで、とても強くてはた迷惑な盗賊団のよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"They're like a very strong and extremely troublesome band of thieves."},{"lineNumber":193244,"originalJapaneseLine":"元々は人類の英雄であった父も現状がそれでは、","translatedEnglishLine":"My father, who was originally a hero of humanity, is now such,"},{"lineNumber":193245,"originalJapaneseLine":"到底人々の尊敬など維持できるものではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"no longer able to maintain the respect of people."},{"lineNumber":193246,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類は父が世界を率いて魔軍と","translatedEnglishLine":"Humanity can no longer maintain the unity they had when my father led the world against the demon army."},{"lineNumber":193247,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦っていた時のような結束は保てなくなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The kind of solidarity they had."},{"lineNumber":193248,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、それは魔軍も同じなようで、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it seems the demon army is the same,"},{"lineNumber":193249,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王である父に統率する気がない為に、","translatedEnglishLine":"because my father, the Demon Lord, has no intention of commanding them,"},{"lineNumber":193250,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくつかの小グループが乱立していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"several small groups have proliferated."},{"lineNumber":193251,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果――","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に遊ぶよりも、遊んでる子達を眺めている方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than playing together, watching the kids playing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の私には性に合っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suits me better right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気一杯にはしゃぎ、平和を謳歌する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing the younger children full of energy and enjoying peace,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分より年下の子達を見ていると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when I look at kids younger than me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずほのぼのとした気持ちに包まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't help but feel a warm and peaceful feeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姫様、お耳に入れられましたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Princess, have you heard?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも、第17次魔王討伐隊が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, the 17th Demon Lord Subjugation Force

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王城に向かったとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: headed towards the Demon Lord's castle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それ私も聞きました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I heard that too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも全滅しちゃったとか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they were all wiped out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How pitiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メンバーの中にいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the members,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 18歳の子が散々犯されたとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an 18-year-old girl, was ruthlessly violated..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、魔王討伐隊に若い娘は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why they say young girls shouldn't be included

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れちゃいけないって言われてるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the Demon Lord Subjugation Force..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　す、すみません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah! I-I'm sorry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘の前で父親の悪行を語ることの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Realizing the meaning of speaking about one's father's misdeeds in front of his daughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味に気づいたようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she seemed to realize it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子は慌ててぺこぺこと頭を下げてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the girl hurriedly bowed repeatedly in apology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は苦笑を浮かべて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I gave a wry smile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいよいいよと手を振って答える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: waving my hand and saying it was fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が悪いかと言われれば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If asked who was at fault...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、やはり――父だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is, of course — father.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わず溜め息が漏れ出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sigh slipped out involuntarily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は遠い空を見上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I looked up at the distant sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は変わってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the world has changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王となった父は、魔物達に対して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father, who became the Demon Lord, toward the demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類圏の戦争行為を禁じ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forbade acts of war in the human realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の各国、そして魔軍も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the countries of the world, and even the demon armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王である父ランスを探したが見つけられず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: searched for my father Rance, the Demon Lord, but could not find him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一年後にまた現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he reappeared a year later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に新魔王軍を宣言し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He declared a new Demon Lord army to the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山に本拠地を作った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and made his base on Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の私の周囲の人達の混乱っぷりを想像すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Imagining how confused the people around me were back then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し、頭痛がする。大変だったろうなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I get a slight headache. It must have been tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父は魔王になっても概ね変わらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father didn't really change much even after becoming the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き勝手、自分本位、やりたい放題。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Selfish, self-centered, doing whatever he pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の魔王と違うらしいのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What seems different from an ordinary Demon Lord is that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父は支配という考えに興味がなかったという点。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my father had no interest in the idea of domination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王軍もせいぜい総数数千に過ぎない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The new Demon Lord army numbers only a few thousand at best,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとした勢力らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a rather small force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、やることは恐ろしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But what they do is terrifying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 定期的に翔竜山より下りて来ては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They regularly come down from Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に攻め込んで可愛い女の子をさらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invade countries, kidnap cute girls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイプするだけして、逃がす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rape them, then let them go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めて来られた国は当然、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The countries attacked naturally

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍で防備を固めるがほとんど意味をなさない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fortify defenses with their armies, but it hardly makes a difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで、とても強くてはた迷惑な盗賊団のよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're like a very strong and extremely troublesome band of thieves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は人類の英雄であった父も現状がそれでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father, who was originally a hero of humanity, is now such,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底人々の尊敬など維持できるものではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no longer able to maintain the respect of people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は父が世界を率いて魔軍と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity can no longer maintain the unity they had when my father led the world against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていた時のような結束は保てなくなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kind of solidarity they had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、それは魔軍も同じなようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it seems the demon army is the same,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王である父に統率する気がない為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because my father, the Demon Lord, has no intention of commanding them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつかの小グループが乱立していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: several small groups have proliferated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result—

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

them,"},{"lineNumber":193250,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくつかの小グループが乱立していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"several small groups have proliferated."},{"lineNumber":193251,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果――","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に遊ぶよりも、遊んでる子達を眺めている方が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than playing together, watching the kids playing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の私には性に合っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suits me better right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気一杯にはしゃぎ、平和を謳歌する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing the younger children full of energy and enjoying peace,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分より年下の子達を見ていると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when I look at kids younger than me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずほのぼのとした気持ちに包まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't help but feel a warm and peaceful feeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「姫様、お耳に入れられましたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Princess, have you heard?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも、第17次魔王討伐隊が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, the 17th Demon Lord Subjugation Force

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王城に向かったとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: headed towards the Demon Lord's castle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それ私も聞きました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I heard that too!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも全滅しちゃったとか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, they were all wiped out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「可哀想に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How pitiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メンバーの中にいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One of the members,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 18歳の子が散々犯されたとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an 18-year-old girl, was ruthlessly violated..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、魔王討伐隊に若い娘は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why they say young girls shouldn't be included

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れちゃいけないって言われてるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the Demon Lord Subjugation Force..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　す、すみません！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah! I-I'm sorry!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娘の前で父親の悪行を語ることの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Realizing the meaning of speaking about one's father's misdeeds in front of his daughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味に気づいたようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she seemed to realize it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子は慌ててぺこぺこと頭を下げてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the girl hurriedly bowed repeatedly in apology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は苦笑を浮かべて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I gave a wry smile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいよいいよと手を振って答える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: waving my hand and saying it was fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が悪いかと言われれば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If asked who was at fault...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、やはり――父だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is, of course — father.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わず溜め息が漏れ出て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sigh slipped out involuntarily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は遠い空を見上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I looked up at the distant sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は変わってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the world has changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王となった父は、魔物達に対して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father, who became the Demon Lord, toward the demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類圏の戦争行為を禁じ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forbade acts of war in the human realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、姿を消した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の各国、そして魔軍も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the countries of the world, and even the demon armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王である父ランスを探したが見つけられず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: searched for my father Rance, the Demon Lord, but could not find him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一年後にまた現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he reappeared a year later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界に新魔王軍を宣言し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He declared a new Demon Lord army to the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山に本拠地を作った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and made his base on Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の私の周囲の人達の混乱っぷりを想像すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Imagining how confused the people around me were back then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し、頭痛がする。大変だったろうなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I get a slight headache. It must have been tough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父は魔王になっても概ね変わらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father didn't really change much even after becoming the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き勝手、自分本位、やりたい放題。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Selfish, self-centered, doing whatever he pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普通の魔王と違うらしいのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What seems different from an ordinary Demon Lord is that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 父は支配という考えに興味がなかったという点。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: my father had no interest in the idea of domination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新魔王軍もせいぜい総数数千に過ぎない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The new Demon Lord army numbers only a few thousand at best,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとした勢力らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a rather small force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、やることは恐ろしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But what they do is terrifying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 定期的に翔竜山より下りて来ては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They regularly come down from Mount Shoryu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に攻め込んで可愛い女の子をさらって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invade countries, kidnap cute girls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイプするだけして、逃がす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rape them, then let them go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めて来られた国は当然、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The countries attacked naturally

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍で防備を固めるがほとんど意味をなさない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fortify defenses with their armies, but it hardly makes a difference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで、とても強くてはた迷惑な盗賊団のよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're like a very strong and extremely troublesome band of thieves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は人類の英雄であった父も現状がそれでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father, who was originally a hero of humanity, is now such,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 到底人々の尊敬など維持できるものではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no longer able to maintain the respect of people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は父が世界を率いて魔軍と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity can no longer maintain the unity they had when my father led the world against the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていた時のような結束は保てなくなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kind of solidarity they had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、それは魔軍も同じなようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it seems the demon army is the same,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王である父に統率する気がない為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because my father, the Demon Lord, has no intention of commanding them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつかの小グループが乱立していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: several small groups have proliferated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result—
